snippet: A South Korean nuclear inspector on a mission for the United Nations was killed, and a Slovakian inspector was injured, when their car overturned.
abstract: South Korean nuclear inspector is killed, and a Slovakian inspector is injured, after their car overturns near a nuclear site southwest of Tehran; men were both part of the mission to Iran by the International Atomic Energy Agency.
lead_paragraph: A South Korean nuclear inspector on a mission for the United Nations was killed, and a Slovakian inspector was injured, when their car overturned.

headline.seo: Nuclear Inspector Dies in Iran Crash
headline.main: Nuclear Inspector Dies in Iran Crash
headline.print_headline: Iran: Nuclear Inspector Killed in Crash
